content: ** a classic vintage-inspired snowflake ornament featuring clusters and picots this little holiday treat is quick and fun to make hang one on your tree for that final touch decorate the top of a wrapped gift with one make a few to hang as garland throw one in a stocking as a little treasure or create a special memory guiding your kiddo through this pattern as they crochet one as a special gift for a teacher or loved one ** **pattern is available for free here https //www youtube com/watch v=cawgvfs_fio&t=19s** ☑ instant download pdf file for the snowflake ornament crochet pattern ☑ skill beginner / advanced-beginner ☑ video tutorials provided ☑ language standard american terms written in english ☑ size approx 6 x6 ☑ required materials pattern includes linked shopping list for exact materials yarn approx 80 yds worsted/medium-weight category 4 hook h 5mm *✔ disclaimer all knitting patterns and crochet patterns are instant-download digital files no patterns are shipped resell finished product with pattern credit © darlingjadore all rights reserved *
